Rank.Description: When receiving a single target heal, you have a 10% chance of gaining a Pact.
When receiving a single target heal, you have a 20% chance of gaining a Pact.
When receiving a single target heal, you have a 30% chance of gaining a Pact.
Generates additional threat to up to 10 nearby enemies based on Endurance whenever a Pact is gained.
Increases Armor by 2%.
Increases Armor by 4%.
Increases Armor by 6%.
Increases Armor by 8%.
Increases Armor by 10%.
Increases your Attack Power and Weapon Damage by 2%.
Increases your Attack Power and Weapon Damage by 4%.
Increases your Attack Power and Weapon Damage by 6%.
Increases your Attack Power and Weapon Damage by 8%.
Increases your Attack Power and Weapon Damage by 10%.
Increases the non Spell damage reduction on Void by 2%, and the Spell damage reduction on Void by 4%. Increases outgoing damage by 5%.
Increases the non Spell damage reduction on Void by 4%, and the Spell damage reduction on Void by 8%. Increases outgoing damage by 10%.
Increases all Resists by 1%.
Increases all Resists by 2%.
Increases all Resists by 3%.
Increases all Resists by 4%.
Increases all Resists by 5%.
Abilities that consume Pacts cost 2 less Power. Pact duration is increased by 5s.
Abilities that consume Pacts cost 4 less Power. Pact duration is increased by 10s.
Abilities that consume Pacts cost 6 less Power. Pact duration is increased by 15s.

Ability.Description: Enables Guard. Increases Armor by 3%, and Resistances by 9%. Does not stack with Shield of the Hero. Lasts 1h.

Rank.Description: Increases Base Health by 2%.
Increases Base Health by 4%.
Increases Base Health by 6%.
Increases Base Health by 8%.
Increases Base Health by 10%.

Ability.Description: Removes 1 Buff. Applies 1 Pact to the Warrior.

Rank.Description: Unlocks the Spell Sunder ability.

Reckless Strike and Ragestorm now deal weapon plus 0.5% of your Attack Power as additional Air damage for each active Pact. Devouring Blow deals 0.5% of your Attack Power for each Attack Point used per Pact as additional Air damage.

Reckless Strike and Ragestorm now deal weapon plus 1% of your Attack Power as additional Air damage for each active Pact. Devouring Blow deals 1% of your Attack Power for each Attack Point used per Pact as additional Air damage.

Reckless Strike and Ragestorm now deal weapon plus 1.5% of your Attack Power as additional Air damage for each active Pact. Devouring Blow deals 1.5% of your Attack Power for each Attack Point used per Pact as additional Air damage.

Ability.Description: Removes 1 Curse. Applies 1 Pact to the Warrior.

Rank.Description: Unlocks the Spellbreaker ability.
Furious Rage debilitates the enemy for 4 seconds on a successful interrupt.

Ability.Description: Teleports the enemy to the Warrior. Roots for 1.5s. Forces the enemy to attack the Warrior for 3s. Awards 1 Attack Point.

Rank.Description: Unlocks the Rift Summon ability.
Reduces incoming spell damage by 15% for 1.5 seconds after casting Spellbreaker.
Reduces incoming spell damage by 15% for 3 seconds after casting Spellbreaker.
When gaining a pact from Void, Spellbreaker, Spell Sunder or Unstable Reaction you have a 10% chance to gain an additional Pact.
When gaining a pact from Void, Spellbreaker, Spell Sunder or Unstable Reaction you have a 20% chance to gain an additional Pact.
When gaining a pact from Void, Spellbreaker, Spell Sunder or Unstable Reaction you have a 30% chance to gain an additional Pact.
Increases damage by 5%. Reduces damage taken from Spells by 1%.
Increases damage by 10%. Reduces damage taken from Spells by 2%.

Ability.Description: Consume up to 5 Pacts to absorb 636 damage per Pact consumed. Lasts 30s.

Rank.Description: Unlocks the Rift Shield ability.
Increases the range of Summons by 5 meters.
Increases the range of Summons by 10 meters.
Increases Absorption value of Absorb shields by 7%. Increases all non Physical damage by 5%.
Increases Absorption value of Absorb shields by 14%. Increases all non Physical damage by 10%.
Increases Absorption value of Absorb shields by 21%. Increases all non Physical damage by 15%.
Gaining a Pact has a 10% chance to refresh your Summon abilities.

Ability.Description: Consumes up to 3 pacts to deal 741 Air damage modified for each Pact consumed to up to 5 enemies in front of the Warrior.

Rank.Description: Increases the range of Discharge, Spark, Shock, and Unstable Reaction by 5. Reduces damage taken from Spells by 4%.

Ability.Description: Consume 1 Pact each second for a maximum of 6s to Absorb 1271 damage per stack, and awarding 1 Attack Point every 2 seconds. Absorbs last 15s.
Movement speed is increased by 10%. Damage taken from spells is reduced by 5%. Lasts 1h.

Rank.Description: Gain a Pact every 9 seconds, and increases the damage of Destructive Forces by 15%.
Gain a Pact every 6 seconds, and increases the damage of Destructive Forces by 35%.
Gain a Pact every 3 seconds, and increases the damage of Destructive Forces by 50%.

Ability.Description: Teleports up to 5 enemies near the targeted enemy to the Warrior. Roots affected enemies for 1.5s. Forces affected enemies to attack the Warrior for 3s. Awards 1 Attack Point.

Rank.Description: Unlocks the Devouring Shield ability.

AbilityRank.Description: Consume 1 Pact each second for a maximum of 6s to Absorb 1271 damage per stack, and awarding 1 Attack Point every 2 seconds. Absorbs last 15s.
Increases incoming healing effectiveness by 10%, and outgoing damage by 20%. Grants the effects of Accord of Power, Accord of Resilience, and Accord of Shifting. Lasts 1h.
Enables Guard. Increases Armor by 3%, and Resistances by 9%. Does not stack with Shield of the Hero. Lasts 1h.
Debilitates for 5s.
Teleports up to 5 enemies near the targeted enemy to the Warrior. Roots affected enemies for 1.5s. Forces affected enemies to attack the Warrior for 3s. Awards 1 Attack Point.
Creates a field of negative energy which removes 1 Buff from up to 5 enemies, and 1 Poison, Curse or Disease from up to 5 allies each second for 3s.
Increases the Warrior's damage by 20%, in addition to reducing the damage that the Warrior takes by 5%. Increases Base Health by 5%. Gives the effect of Void. Lasts 1h.
Absorbs 2480 damage.
Hurl the enemy back 15 meters. This ability awards 1 Attack Point.
Increases Attack Power and Weapon Contribution by 40%. Lasts 1h.

Deals Air damage based on Attack Points:
1 Point: 1090 damage. 2 Points: 1644 damage. 3 Points: 2483 damage.
Consumes up to 3 pacts to deal 741 Air damage modified for each Pact consumed to up to 5 enemies in front of the Warrior.

Spell ability attacks made against the Warrior are reflected back against the attacker:
1 Point: 1 attack, 12s. 2 Points: 2 attacks, 12s. 3 Points: 3 attacks, 12s.

Consume up to 5 Pacts to reduce incoming damage by 4% per pact consumed for 4s. Adds an absorption shield that absorbs 66 damage per Pact consumed, on up to 5 party or raid members. Lasts 30s. Does not stack with Shield Defense or Crest of Entropy.
Movement speed is increased by 10%. Damage taken from spells is reduced by 5%. Lasts 1h.
Absorbs damage equal to 75% of the Warrior's Maximum Health for 20s.
Reduces non Spell damage taken by 1%, in addition to reducing Spell damage taken by 3%. Taking ability damage gives a 30% chance to gain a Pact. Lasts 1h.
Deals 806 Air damage to up to 10 nearby enemies. Generates significant threat. Awards 1 Attack Point.
Consume up to 5 Pacts to absorb 636 damage per Pact consumed. Lasts 30s.

Increases Base Health by 1% per point spent in the Void Knight soul. Increases Armor by 1% per point spent in the Void Knight soul. Increases Resistances by 2% per point spent in the Void Knight soul. Base Damage is increased by 0.5% for each Point spent in the Void Knight Soul.

Shields the ally, intercepting 50% of the damage they receive, and replacing the ally's Toughness with the Warrior's, for 6s. An ally can only be affected by a tank soul damage intercept once every 2 minutes.
Forces the enemy to attack the Warrior for 3s.
Removes 1 Curse. Applies 1 Pact to the Warrior.
Forces up to 10 enemies to attack the Warrior for 3s.
Deals weapon plus 1209 to 1337 Air damage to up to 5 enemies. Consumes up to 3 pacts. Awards 1 Attack Point.
Consumes up to 3 pacts to deal 741 Air damage modified for each Pact consumed. Awards 1 Attack Point.
Interrupts.
Damaging abilities generate additional threat based off of the Warrior's Endurance.

Deals Air damage to up to 5 enemies in a chain for up to 6s. Generates 1 pact every second:
1 Point: 4477 damage. 2 Points: 6850 damage. 3 Points: 10435 damage.
Debilitates up to 5 enemies for 8s.
Teleports the enemy to the Warrior. Roots for 1.5s. Forces the enemy to attack the Warrior for 3s. Awards 1 Attack Point.
Deals 1248 to 1380 Physical damage. Awards 1 Attack Point.
Removes 1 Buff. Applies 1 Pact to the Warrior.
Finishers gain a bonus to Attack Power contribution based on how many Attack Points were consumed.
